bshields.istation.interfaces

Interface Shelf

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultShelf

    public interface Shelf
    A shelf contains a number of shelf slots, and has a given height.
    Author:
    Brian

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addSlot(ShelfSlot slot)
      Adds a slot to the right side of this shelf

      Adds a slot to this shelf

      int getWidth()
      Gets the total width of the shelf.

      Removes the first instance of the specified slot from this shelf
      void setHeight(int height) 

    • Method Detail

      • getSlots

        java.util.List<ShelfSlot> getSlots()
        Gets a copy of the shelf slots on this shelf. Only a copy is returned; the list is not directly editable.
        Returns:
        a copy of the collection of slots on this shelf
        See Also:
        addSlot(ShelfSlot, int), removeSlot(int), removeSlot(ShelfSlot)

      • addSlot

        void addSlot(ShelfSlot slot)
        Adds a slot to the right side of this shelf
        Parameters:
        slot - the slot to add
        See Also:
        addSlot(ShelfSlot, int)

      • addSlot

        void addSlot(ShelfSlot slot,
             int index)
        Adds a slot to this shelf
        Parameters:
        slot - the slot to add
        index - the location to add it at

      • removeSlot

        boolean removeSlot(ShelfSlot slot)
        Removes the first instance of the specified slot from this shelf
        Parameters:
        slot - the slot to remove
        Returns:
        true if the specified slot was on this shelf
        See Also:
        removeSlot(int)

      • removeSlot

        ShelfSlot removeSlot(int index)
        Removes a slot from a position on the shelf
        Parameters:
        index - the location to remove the slot from
        Returns:
        the slot that was removed
        See Also:
        removeSlot(ShelfSlot)

      • getWidth

        int getWidth()
        Gets the total width of the shelf. This will be the sum of all slots on the shelf.
        Returns:
        the width of the shelf

      • getHeight

        int getHeight()

      • setHeight

        void setHeight(int height)
